Package jeco.core.operator.mutation

Class UniformMutation<T extends Variable<Double>>

java.lang.Object
jeco.core.operator.mutation.MutationOperator<T>
jeco.core.operator.mutation.UniformMutation<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Variable type.
public class UniformMutation<T extends Variable<Double>> extends MutationOperator<T>
UniformMutation mutation operator. It changes the value of a variable with a given probability.
